testimonials.text: With his passion for coding, he should one to look out for in the coming years

Elijah must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met!. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of learning and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
